text:
August 18, 1939
Mr. M. 3. Novlk
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York City
Dear Mr. Novlk:
We have made no attempt to secure
any special plane rates for the NAEB Convention.
As you no doubt understand, our group is
small and most of our members are in the
Middlewest and many drive to the meeting. It
isn’t that we don’t have some come by plane,
for usually Howard Evans and President Crane,
of Wyoming, take planes to the meeting.
If you can make it to Ames, I shall
be happy to see you at that time.
Cordially yours,
FES: EH
Frank E. Schooley
Executive Secretary
